application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of sound insulation assessment and mitigation measures pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 215324FUL dated 11.01.2023 for: Conversion of existing HMO (House in Multiple Occupation) to five flats; two storey side/rear extension with rear inset balconies at first floor, single storey rear extension; rear mansard roof extension; replacement of existing uPVC windows with double glazed timber sash windows; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope; associated soft landscaping, refuse and cycle storage; front boundary wall and gate, lower boundary wall to side courtyard (following demolition of existing single storey rear and outbuilding)
